G

GameBoard - Class in chess
GameBoard class used as the game board of the chess object.
GameBoard() - Constructor for class chess.GameBoard
takes no arguments, and initiates a chess board along with the correct initial pieces.
getBlackKing() - Method in class chess.GameBoard
Finds the integer position of black king
getBoard() - Method in class chess.Chess
Will print the current game board
getName() - Method in class components.ChessPiece
returns the String name of a piece and used for more general cases than the toString method.
getNewPiece(char, ChessPiece) - Static method in class util.Parser
Used mainly for pawn promotion takes in the ChessPiece type for a new piece and the old ChessPiece to generate a new one.
getNewPiece(int, int, int) - Static method in class util.Parser
Used primarily during gameboard initiation.
getPieces() - Method in class chess.Chess
prints all pieces in play.
getPlayer() - Method in class chess.GameBoard
returns integer as the player number
getPosition() - Method in class components.ChessPiece
Used to get the in[] position of a piece
getTotalMoves() - Method in class components.ChessPiece
gets the number of moves that a piece can make
getValidMoves() - Method in class components.Pawn
returns String[] of moves that a pawn is allowed to make
getValidMoves(int, int, String[][]) - Method in class components.ChessPiece
Gets a string array of all moves that a special piece can make.
getValidMoves(String[][]) - Method in class components.Bishop
Used for getting a String[] of all possible moves a bishop can make from its current position.
getValidMoves(String[][]) - Method in class components.ChessPiece
gets a string array of all moves that a piece can make
getValidMoves(String[][]) - Method in class components.Queen
Used for getting a String[] of all possible moves a queen can make from its current position.
getValidMoves(String[][]) - Method in class components.Rook
Used for getting a String[] of all the possible moves the rook piece can make from its current position
getWhiteKing() - Method in class chess.GameBoard
Finds the integer position of white king
